673A08EE.Line3.1086F0: I brought it to one of my corpse groves. The sickness spread. Feasting on the dead. Breathtakingly beautiful. But the Tree senses what harm it could do in another's hands.

8EB65F2C.Line1.1086F0: I was walkin' in the swamp, watchin' mushrooms bloom from a bird carcass, when I sensed it. A new thing. An unknown sickness. There it was - trapped in a rotten corpse. Calling to me. Begging to be cultivated.

B77034BB.VoiceDir3.1086F0: Bitterness and sadness at mentioning the Tree

DEEC8AF9.VoiceDir1.1086F0: Fascination and admiration, and a little obsession. Like an eccentric artist
